channel.title: Guillaume Moigneu - Golang and web stuff
channel.description: Recent content on Guillaume Moigneu - Golang and web stuff

item.title: How to setup a non-production single node Kubernetes cluster
item.description:
I wanted to get my hands on Kubernetes to test the build and deployment process of my Golang project.

As it is only for development and testing purposes, I decided to go with a spare server and to setup only a single node Kubernetes instance.

item.title: Golang project #01 - Project Introduction: Srvpulse
item.description:
What could be a better way of learning a new language and its ecosystem than creating a new side-project?

Let’s wrap up the goals and user stories of this project. Srvpulse.com will be a background jobs (crons, workers, etc.) monitoring system that allows the user to be alerted when something goes wrong. Pretty simple, isn’t it?
